name: Solitaire Good Times
description:
Welcome to Solitaire Good Times! Based on the classic Tripeaks solitaire gameplay, this exquisitely designed game has compiled more features. In this game, you'll get to travel around the globe, complete diverse renovations with various decorations, and record your unforgettable experience with the travel album! Join Carl on the adventurous journey, make friends along the way and help them solve challenging puzzles.

In Solitaire Good Times, thousands of challenging Tripeaks solitaire games are ready for you to play!

On this relaxing and romantic journey, you'll find exciting solitaire puzzles to solve, complete quests for coins, go on adventures in various scenes, help Carl and his friends with renovations, and get extra boosters to improve your play. Take part in events like Poker King, Treasure Hunt & Mermaid Fountain, and win exciting rewards for your achievements!

Fun and quests never end! In Solitaire Good Times, you'll have a good time!

RENOVATE the scenes with lots of decorations and make them perfect!

EXPLORE countless destinations and enjoy local scenery!

JOIN Carl on this fascinating journey and create unforgettable memories!

SOLVE creative and engaging puzzles that are like no other games!

CUSTOMIZE your cards and stylize the game in your own way!

MAKE your very own travel album!

ENRICHED quests and fun mini-games keep coming!

MAGICAL boosters help you complete quests and win rewards!

Are you a globetrotter? Do you want to renovate the deserted garden? Or do you need a break and play some solitaire card games?

Solitaire Good Times can meet all your needs! Start the game and have a good time!

- More than 6,000 Tripeaks solitaire levels!
- New levels are updated every other week!
- Regular updates introducing new content and limited-time events full of new elements, gameplay and scenes!
- Numerous popular mini-games!
- More than 30 unlockable themes, including Dream of Egypt, Greek Terrace, Aurora Village, Thai Garden, etc.
- Over 200 decorations for you to explore!
- Challenge yourself with featured animal rescue levels, frozen cards, golden eggs and more.
- Magical boosters that bring you endless joy!

Play it anywhere without an Internet connection.

Being alone can be so enjoyable! Solitaire Good Times makes your solo time relaxing and rewarding!

Get ready and start the adventure. Global travel starts today!


Download now to enjoy never-ending fun!
